product.title: Linear Pumice Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
product.description: Crisp, smart and stylish, this chic blind features some subtle but beautiful detailing. The grey tone comes from the brown and cream pinstripes across the slats, making for a mixed look thats at once earthy and warm, and cleanly modern. Designed to be effortlessly fitted in crisp, smart and stylish, this chic blind features some subtle but beautiful detailing.

relproducts.title: Linear Stem Papaya Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Add some vibrancy and style to your life with this striking linear stem papaya roller blind. A mix of iconic orla kiely pattern with a bright orange hue could be just what your home has been looking for. Practical as well as stylish this blind is easy to raise and lower while the add some vibrancy and style to your life with this striking linear stem papaya roller blind.

relproducts.title: Linear Stem Duck Egg Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Taking a tight, busy pattern and simplifying it beautifully with a pared back palette, orla kielys talent for design is as evident as ever with this linear stem duck egg roller blind. The beautiful floral pattern is simple, yes, but delightfully imagined, line drawn stems and taking a tight, busy pattern and simplifying it beautifully with a pared back palette, orla kielys talent for design is as evident as ever with this linear stem duck egg roller blind.

relproducts.title: Linear Pumice Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Here the linear pumice venetian blind features narrow hand-drawn pin stripes in cream and soft brown; the colours combine to give a grey pumice shade with a cool and relaxed feel.

relproducts.title: Linear Stem Silver Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This linear stem silver roller blind is classic orla kiely in a contemporary setting. That iconic stem pattern is well-known and much-loved while the grey and white palette offers a contemporary twist. relproducts.title: Linear Stem Cool Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Famed for her love of 70s design and retro design sensibilities, orla kiely has produced here something deliciously contemporary. relproducts.title: Linear Stucco Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Designed to fit effortlessly into upvc windows and doors, this stunning blind offers effortless fitting and an integrated look thats super smart. relproducts.title: Linear Stucco Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Giving the impression of a ridged fabric, this textured design features slightly wavy vertical stripes in two separate shades of brown. relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.
